item.title: The State Bank of Pakistan to Withdraw its Warning on Cryptocurrency Trading
item.description: On September 3rd, the Pakistani Ministry of Finance made an announcement. It stated that the State Bank of Pakistan will withdraw its warning regarding cryptocurrency trading. At the same time, the State Bank of Pakistan is in the process of working to launch a digital currency.Previously reported by BlockBeats, on July 27th, the Pakistani Minister of State for Cryptocurrency and Blockchain, Bilal Bin Saqib, pointed out that the country's demographic structure would drive the adoption of Bitcoin and achieve "leapfrog development", surpassing developed countries in this regard. Bilal Bin Saqib emphasized that Pakistan has 40 million crypto wallets, making it one of the top five countries globally in terms of the cryptocurrency adoption rate. The country has a median age of 20 years, a total population of 250 million, with 70% of the population being under 30 years old. "Emerging markets will achieve leapfrog development in the adoption of these new technologies, and smaller countries

item.title: Top L2 Network Linea Finally Launches Mainnet after Three Years of Development, Set to Go Live on September 10th
item.description: On September 3rd, Linea, the premier Ethereum Layer 2 network developed by Consensys, has finally launched its native token after a three-year development period. Currently, the airdrop query is officially available, and the TGE will occur on September 10th.Linea's team stated that the relationship between LINEA and ETH is similar to that of silver and gold. They will empower the Ethereum ecosystem through a native asset income mechanism, a dual-token burn model (ETH + LINEA), value flowing back to the Layer 1 network, and sustainable funding for open-source software. Their goal is to build the most ETH-centric Layer 2 network, with scaling and strengthening Ethereum being inseparable dual goals.

item.title: KuCoin Launches Innovative Cloud Mining Platform KuMining, Product to Be Available for Purchase Starting September 16th
item.description: September 3rd. According to official information, KuCoin declared the launch of the innovative cloud mining platform KuMining. This will enable individual investors to obtain hashing power at a competitive price.It is reported that the platform supports Bitcoin (BTC) and Dogecoin (DOGE), including Litecoin (LTC) merged mining. It relies on a 300-megawatt to 2-gigawatt infrastructure (provided by elphapex) and an initial 10 EH/s BTC hashing power. Through cooperation with professional manufacturers and energy experts, decentralized hashing power is achieved. Thousands of liquid-cooled machines will be added monthly to ensure capacity expansion and real-time transparent monitoring of operations. The product will be available for purchase starting from September 16th.

item.title: CanGu Group produced 663.7 Bitcoins in August, bringing their total holdings to 5197 Bitcoins.
item.description: September 3rd: Canaan Inc. ("Canaan" or "the Company") provided its August 2025 Bitcoin production and operational update on September 2nd. The figures indicate that the company mined 663.7 bitcoins in August, increasing its total holdings to 5,193.4 bitcoins. The company intends to hold Bitcoin for the long term and currently has no plans to sell.Canaan's CEO and Director, Paul Yu, offered the following comments: "Since attaining full production of the additional 50 EH/s of mining power in July, the company's average monthly operational hash rate has witnessed a 6.9% growth. This month's production of 663.7 bitcoins has enabled the company to surpass the 5,000 bitcoins milestone, a notable achievement that firmly validates our strategic orientation and lays a solid foundation for sustainable development."

item.title: Coinbase is planning to launch the first U.S. stock and cryptocurrency blended index futures, with the index composition including seven giants, COIN, and two BlackRock spot ETFs.
item.description: On September 3rd, as per official channels, Coinbase declared that its derivative trading platform is constantly expanding its product range and is planning to launch the innovative Mag7+ Cryptocurrency Stock Index Futures, which is the first derivative futures contract in the US to simultaneously cover both stocks and cryptocurrencies. The composition of the index includes:· US Stocks "Big Seven": Apple (AAPL), Microsoft (MSFT), Google (GOOGL), Amazon (AMZN), Nvidia (NVDA), Meta (META), Tesla (TSLA)· Coinbase Stock (COIN)· Cryptocurrency ETFs: Bletchley Bitcoin Trust (IBIT), Ethereum Trust (ETHA)The index adopts an equally weighted calculation method, with each of the 10 components holding a 10% weight, and undergoes quarterly rebalancing to reflect market fluctuations. MarketVector acts as the official index provider. The contracts utilize a monthly cash settlement model, with each contract representing 1 times the index value, and it is expected that trading of this product

item.title: Glassnode: ETH Whale Cohort Shows Divergence in Market Direction
item.description: September 3rd. During August, a directional divergence emerged among the largest holders of ETH. Whales (with holdings ≥10,000 ETH) drove an upward trend. There was a peak net inflow of more than 2.2 million ETH on the 30th. However, their accumulation behavior has currently come to a halt. Meanwhile, Dolphins (with holdings from 1,000 to 10,000 ETH), after weeks of selling off, have started to accumulate again. There was a net addition of more than 411,000 ETH in the past 30 days.

item.title: Analysis: USDT On-Chain Transaction Volume Hits All-Time High, Market May Be Gearing Up for a Major Rally
item.description: On September 3rd, CryptoOnchain disclosed data on social media indicating that the 30-day moving average trading volume of USDT (on the Ethereum and Tron networks) has reached a new all-time high. Meanwhile, the daily transaction volume on August 22, 2025, reached $77.8 billion, which is the highest level since the May 2022 crisis. The continuous surge in USDT's on-chain activity shows that funds are strategically positioning themselves to deal with significant market fluctuations.CryptoOnchain stated that the record-breaking USDT trading volume is a key signal of the movement of "smart money". This strongly implies that the market is preparing for a major move. Traders should closely monitor liquidity changes and overall market indicators as a decisive high-volatility period seems to be approaching.

item.title: Binance Alpha Launches Hyperbot (BOT)
item.description: On September 3rd, as per official information, Binance Alpha has launched Hyperbot (BOT).

item.title: QCP Capital: If global economic growth remains robust, the US dollar is highly likely to weaken from here
item.description: September 3rd - QCP Capital announced in its official channel that with the advent of September, the market's focus has transitioned from the magnitude of the rate cut to the independence of the Fed. The increase in term premia and the lowering of the threshold for the USD downcycle suggest a steepening yield curve, a weaker dollar, and offer support for gold and Bitcoin as hedging instruments.The Jackson Hole meeting has redirected the focus towards a risk-oriented cooling of the labor market, making a September rate cut still a potential outcome. Two rate cuts within the year appear reasonable; currently, investors need to keep a close eye on the balance between the inflation rate and tariff-driven inflation expectations. If global economic growth remains strong, the dollar is very likely to weaken from this point onwards.

item.title: OKX will list an OKB-settled perpetual contract, supporting up to 20x leverage.
item.description: September 3rd. As per official information, OKX is set to officially list the OKBUSDT perpetual contract on September 4, 2025, at 10:00 AM (UTC+8) across its website, app, and API, with a leverage of up to 20x.
